new_alert.content: You can now import courses from the official UNSW Handbook

project.what_answer: {{app}} is a simple grade calculator for students to know the minimum grade to reach their desired course results.
project.why_answer_1: As a student myself, I often struggle when managing multiple courses while I was in University.
project.why_answer_2: This web application is made in hope that it will simplify the process of managing courses so that you can focus on achieving your goal.
project.how: How do I contribute to this project?
project.how_answer: This project's repository is hosted publicly on

author.title: Author
author.who_answer_1: I am a Computer Science graduate from UNSW.
author.who_answer_2: My interests include: making web applications with React, bowling and video games.
